description: Installed through flathub.org. It will fail to detect songs in my "Music" folder and closes instantly. Unfortunately it is unusable at this stage.
So how do you add music to this? I see no settings dilouge, and I can't drag and drop the contents of an external drive. It looks interesting but until I can add my music folderI am unable to use it.
Album covers are missing but otherwise it's really good

After copying files to home/music everything works
as expected.
Window control buttons always appear on the right (though they should be on the left, as set in the system), no global menu. Artwork fetching functionallity is good though.
summary: Not the best fit for kde

description: Solo funciona con los iconos originales de kde, seria genial que se pueda integrar con otros iconos
